name: Wizard's Apprentice (Harri J)
description:
Find ingredients for the Frog Wizard's potion in this cosy 3D fantasy fetch quest game!

This project was worked on in a 3 week game jam elective at Otago Polytechnic by myself (Harri J) and Ben Mead.

Supported by Otago Polytech tutors Lisa Blakie, Josiah Hunt, Paul Fox and Edwin McRae.
